title: Energy - Finding net work from velocity time graph

content.description: A box moving on a horizontal surface experiences a varying force that changes its velocity. The graph shows the velocity of the box as a function of time.
content.question:
Which of the following correctly describes the net work <math alttext="W sub net" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> done on the box for the given intervals of time?

Between <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
 Between <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="t sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
 Between <math alttext="t sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="t sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

A
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is less than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

B
 <math alttext="W sub net equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

C
 <math alttext="W sub net equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is less than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

D
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="W sub net is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
